Description: The rest on the flight into Egypt, a night piece; the Holy Family resting beneath tree, around a lantern; third state with head of ass added to right before reworking by another hand. c.1644 Etching and drypoint
Curator's comments: For an impression of the first state and comment see 1868,0822.663.
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (216.III) (Rembrandt)
Hind 1923 / A Catalogue of Rembrandt's Etchings; chronologically arranged and completely illustrated (208.IIIa)
White & Boon 1969 / Rembrandt's Etchings: An Illustrated Critical Catalogue (57.IV)
Exhibition history: 2019 7 Feb-4 Aug, BM, G90, 'Rembrandt: thinking on paper'
